str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a derivative of muo; a secret or 'mystery'.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: To hide away, conceal, keep secret. From apo and krupto; to conceal away; figuratively, to keep secret.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
From the same as aei; properly, an age; by extension, perpetuity; by implication, the world; specially a Messianic period.
From genos; a generation; by implication, an age.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To make clear (visible, manifest), make known. From phaneros; to render apparent.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.
